</ul></span>

<div class="thumbnav"><span><a class="blue" href="race/tour-de-france">Tour de France</a></span><span>&nbsp; » &nbsp;</span><span><a class="blue" href="race/tour-de-france/2015">2015</a></span><span>&nbsp; » &nbsp;</span><span><a class="blue" href="race/tour-de-france/2015/results/combative-riders">Combative riders </a></span></div>
<div class="titleCont hasSideNav"><div class="page-title"><div class="title"><span class="flag fr w32"></span><span class="flag c24 fr "></span> <h1><span class="hideIfMobile">2015 &nbsp; » &nbsp; 102nd </span>Tour de France</h1></div><div class="subtitle hide imob block"><h2>2015</h2></div><div class="clear"></div><div class="title-line2 hideIfMobile"><font class="blue">21 Stages</font> &nbsp; » &nbsp; <font class="red">Utrecht &nbsp;›&nbsp; Paris</font> &nbsp; <font class="red" style="font-weight: normal; ">(3360.3km)</font></div></div><a class="toggleSideMenu" href="">menu</a></div>
<div class="desktop-ad leaderbord general"></div><div class="mob-ad leaderbord general"></div><div class="top-cont"></div><div class="top-cont-mobile top-cont-mobile-race"></div>
<div class="page-content ">
<h2>Combative riders per stage</h2>
<div class=""><div class="">
<div class="fs14">Overview of the most combative riders per stage. </div>
</div>
<div class="mt20">
<table class=" basic" style="max-width: 450px; "><thead><tr>
<th class="w25 ">Stage</th>
